snippet.title: Total World War - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Total World War is coming on PC & Nintendo Switch on 2019 !

Facebook fan page : https://www.facebook.com/totalworldwar/

Total World War is a classical turn-based strategy with funny generals and great tactical depth.
Total World War will allow games up to 4 players, controlling different armies with their own special weapon.
Easy to pick up, Total World War offers funny visuals and many different strategies to defeat your ennemies.

Don't hesitate to like our Facebook page or subscribe to our Youtube account for more content in following weeks.
